Detonate.name: Detonate
Detonate.description: Explode with variable damage (thing damage field).

Mushroom.name: Mushroom
Mushroom.description: Creates a mushroom explosion effect by throwing fireballs up in all directions and causing radius damage.

unused.name: Fireball angle
unused.description: The angle to throw the fireballs in.

unused.name: Fireball speed
unused.description: The speed to throw the fireballs at.

Spawn.name: Spawn
Spawn.description: Spawns a thing at the position of this thing.

unused.name: Z
unused.description: The relative Z position to spawn the thing at.

unused.name: Full volume
unused.description: If set to 1, the sound effect will play at full volume regardless of the distance.

RandomJump.name: RandomJump
RandomJump.description: A random chance to jump to a state. Duration must not be -1.

unused.name: State
unused.description: The state number to jump to.

unused.name: Chance
unused.description: The chance that the jump is executed. Ranged 0 to 255.

PlayWeaponSound.name: PlayWeaponSound
PlayWeaponSound.description: Plays a sound from the weapon sound channel.

arguments.name: Sound
arguments.description: The sound to play.

arguments.name: Full volume
arguments.description: If set to 1, the sound effect will play at full volume regardless of the distance.

FastChase.name: FastChase
FastChase.description: Fast version of the standard walking code pointer.

arguments.name: Damage
arguments.description: The amount of damage the Railgun shot will do.

arguments.name: Offset
arguments.description: The offset of the Railgun shot.

CPA_Execute.name: CPA_Execute
CPA_Execute.description: Executes an ACS script from an actor state.

arguments.name: Script
arguments.description: The script index to execute.

arguments.name: Map
arguments.description: The map to execute the script on.

CPW_Execute.name: CPW_Execute
CPW_Execute.description: Executes an ACS script from a weapon state.

arguments.name: Script
arguments.description: The script index to execute.

arguments.name: Map
arguments.description: The map to execute the script on.

CPA_ExecuteAlways.name: CPA_ExecuteAlways
CPA_ExecuteAlways.description: Executes an ACS script from an actor state. Multiple instances of the script index will be run.

arguments.name: Script
arguments.description: The script index to execute.

arguments.name: Map
arguments.description: The map to execute the script on.

CPW_ExecuteAlways.name: CPW_ExecuteAlways
CPW_ExecuteAlways.description: Executes an ACS script from a weapon state. Multiple instances of the script index will be run.

arguments.name: Script
arguments.description: The script index to execute.

arguments.name: Map
arguments.description: The map to execute the script on.

CPA_LockedExecute.name: CPA_LockedExecute
CPA_LockedExecute.description: Executes an ACS script from an actor state, if the activator has the right key. A remote message will be printed if the activator does not have the right key combination ('You need ... to activate this object').

arguments.name: Script
arguments.description: The script index to execute.

arguments.name: Map
arguments.description: The map to execute the script on.

arguments.name: Lock keys
arguments.description: The key combination needed to execute the script.

CPW_LockedExecute.name: CPW_LockedExecute
CPW_LockedExecute.description: Executes an ACS script from a weapon state, if the activator has the right key. A remote message will be printed if the activator does not have the right key combination ('You need ... to activate this object').

arguments.name: Script
arguments.description: The script index to execute.

arguments.name: Map
arguments.description: The map to execute the script on.

arguments.name: Lock keys
arguments.description: The key combination needed to execute the script.

CPA_LockedExecuteDoor.name: CPA_LockedExecuteDoor
CPA_LockedExecuteDoor.description: Executes an ACS script from an actor state, if the activator has the right key. A local door message will be printed if the activator does not have the right key combination ('You need ... to open this door').

arguments.name: Script
arguments.description: The script index to execute.

arguments.name: Map
arguments.description: The map to execute the script on.

arguments.name: Lock keys
arguments.description: The key combination needed to execute the script.

CPW_LockedExecuteDoor.name: CPW_LockedExecuteDoor
CPW_LockedExecuteDoor.description: Executes an ACS script from a weapon state, if the activator has the right key. A local door message will be printed if the activator does not have the right key combination ('You need ... to open this door').

arguments.name: Script
arguments.description: The script index to execute.

arguments.name: Map
arguments.description: The map to execute the script on.

arguments.name: Lock keys
arguments.description: The key combination needed to execute the script.

CPA_Suspend.name: CPA_Suspend
CPA_Suspend.description: Suspends a script from an actor state.

arguments.name: Script
arguments.description: The script index to suspend.

arguments.name: Map
arguments.description: The map to suspend the script on.

CPW_Suspend.name: CPW_Suspend
CPW_Suspend.description: Suspends a script from a weapon state.

arguments.name: Script
arguments.description: The script index to suspend.

arguments.name: Map
arguments.description: The map to suspend the script on.

CPA_Terminate.name: CPA_Terminate
CPA_Terminate.description: Terminates a script from an actor state.

arguments.name: Script
arguments.description: The script index to terminate.

arguments.name: Map
arguments.description: The map to terminate the script on.

CPW_Terminate.name: CPW_Terminate
CPW_Terminate.description: Terminates a script from a weapon state.

arguments.name: Script
arguments.description: The script index to terminate.

arguments.name: Map
arguments.description: The map to terminate the script on.

SetReflective.name: SetReflective
SetReflective.description: Makes the thing reflective. Any projectiles that strike it will bounce off of it, though it will still take damage.

UnSetReflective.name: UnSetReflective
UnSetReflective.description: The thing will no longer be reflective.

SetInvulnerable.name: SetInvulnerable
SetInvulnerable.description: Makes the thing impervious to damage.

UnSetInvulnerable.name: UnSetInvulnerable
UnSetInvulnerable.description: Makes the thing able to take damage again.

SetShootable.name: SetShootable
SetShootable.description: The thing can be hit by projectiles and hitscan weapons.

UnSetShootable.name: UnSetShootable
UnSetShootable.description: The thing cannot be hit by projectiles and hitscan weapons.

FireRailgun.name: FireRailgun
FireRailgun.description: Fires a railgun from the center of the player's screen. Only for player weapons.

FireRailgunRight.name: FireRailgunRight
FireRailgunRight.description: Fires a railgun from the right side of the player's screen. Only for player weapons.

FireRailgunLeft.name: FireRailgunLeft
FireRailgunLeft.description: Fires a railgun from the left side of the player's screen. Only for player weapons.

MonsterRail.name: MonsterRail
MonsterRail.description: Makes a monster fire a railgun. The amount of damage dealt by the railgun is determined by the monster's Missile Damage field.

RailWait.name: RailWait
RailWait.description: Deprecated, exactly the same as NULL.

SetReflectiveInvulnerable.name: SetReflectiveInvulnerable
SetReflectiveInvulnerable.description: Makes the thing reflect projectiles, and makes it impervious to other types of damage.

UnSetReflectiveInvulnerable.name: UnSetReflectiveInvulnerable
UnSetReflectiveInvulnerable.description: Makes the thing no longer reflect projectiles, and makes it susceptible to other types of damage again.

Gravity.name: Gravity
Gravity.description: Allows the thing to fall under the effects of gravity.

NoGravity.name: NoGravity
NoGravity.description: Causes the thing to float in the air instead of fall.

arguments.name: Amount
arguments.description: The number of bullets to fire.

arguments.name: Sound
arguments.description: The sound to play when firing.

arguments.name: Spread H
arguments.description: The horizontal spread of the bullets.

arguments.name: Spread V
arguments.description: The vertical spread ot the bullets.

arguments.name: Amount
arguments.description: The amount of bullets to fire.

arguments.name: Damage
arguments.description: The damage per bullet.

arguments.name: Puff
arguments.description: The puff thing type.

arguments.name: Range
arguments.description: The maximum range of the bullets. 0 is the same as the default of 2048 units.

arguments.name: Flags
arguments.description: A flag bitmask. See the ZDaemon documentation for more info.

arguments.name: Sound
arguments.description: The sound to play when firing.

CPA_CustomMissile.name: CPA_CustomMissile
CPA_CustomMissile.description: A customizable projectile attack for monsters.

arguments.name: Type
arguments.description: The thing type to spawn.

arguments.name: Z
arguments.description: The Z height to spawn at, relative to the thing's feet.

arguments.name: Offset H
arguments.description: Horizontal spawn offset

arguments.name: Angle
arguments.description: The direction relative to the thing's facing angle in which to shoot the projectile.

arguments.name: Pitch
arguments.description: Used with one of the flag values.

arguments.name: Sound
arguments.description: The sound number to play when firing.

arguments.name: Flags
arguments.description: Bitmask of flags to use. See ZDaemon documentation for more info.

arguments.name: Amount
arguments.description: The number of bullets to fire.

arguments.name: Sound
arguments.description: The sound to play when firing.

arguments.name: Spread H
arguments.description: The horizontal spread of the bullets.

arguments.name: Spread V
arguments.description: The vertical spread ot the bullets.

arguments.name: Amount
arguments.description: The amount of bullets to fire.

arguments.name: Damage
arguments.description: The damage per bullet.

arguments.name: Puff
arguments.description: The puff thing type.

arguments.name: Range
arguments.description: The maximum range of the bullets. 0 is the same as the default of 2048 units.

arguments.name: Flags
arguments.description: A flag bitmask. See the ZDaemon documentation for more info.

arguments.name: Sound
arguments.description: The sound to play when firing.

CPW_CustomMissile.name: CPW_CustomMissile
CPW_CustomMissile.description: A customizable projectile attack for player weapons.

arguments.name: Type
arguments.description: The thing type to spawn.

arguments.name: Z
arguments.description: The Z height to spawn at, relative to the thing's feet.

arguments.name: Offset H
arguments.description: Horizontal spawn offset

arguments.name: Angle
arguments.description: The direction relative to the thing's facing angle in which to shoot the projectile.

arguments.name: Pitch
arguments.description: Used with one of the flag values.

arguments.name: Sound
arguments.description: The sound number to play when firing.

arguments.name: Flags
arguments.description: Bitmask of flags to use. See ZDaemon documentation for more info.

arguments.name: Ammo
arguments.description: The ammo type index to use if set in flags.

CLIENTSIDE.name: Client-side only
CLIENTSIDE.description: This thing will only exist on clients.

SERVERONLY.name: Server-side only
SERVERONLY.description: This thing will only exist on servers.

INTEAMMODES.name: Team mode
INTEAMMODES.description: Spawns this thing in team modes (for key cards\skull keys).

FRIENDLY.name: Friendly
FRIENDLY.description: This thing is friendly to players.

UNMORPHED.name: Unmorphed
UNMORPHED.description: This thing is an unmorphed version of something else.

STEALTH.name: Stealth effect
STEALTH.description: This thing is a stealth type monster.

LOGRAV.name: Low gravity
LOGRAV.description: Alternate gravity setting for this thing.

WINDTHRUST.name: Affected by wind
WINDTHRUST.description: This thing gets pushed around by the wind specials.

BLASTED.name: Blasted
BLASTED.description: This thing will take temporary damage from impact.

FLY.name: Fly mode
FLY.description: Fly mode is active for this thing.

SPAWNFLOAT.name: Spawn at random Z
SPAWNFLOAT.description: Spawns this thing at a random floating Z.

RIP.name: Rips through solids
RIP.description: This projectile will rip through solid targets.

PUSHABLE.name: Can be pushed
PUSHABLE.description: This thing can be pushed by other moving things.

CANSLIDE.name: Slides against walls
CANSLIDE.description: This thing can slide against walls.

ONMOBJ.name: Is atop another
ONMOBJ.description: This thing is resting atop another thing.

PASSMOBJ.name: Pass over\under
PASSMOBJ.description: Allows this thing to pass over\under other things.

CANNOTPUSH.name: Cannot push
CANNOTPUSH.description: This thing cannot push other pushable things.

THRUGHOST.name: Paas through ghosts
THRUGHOST.description: This projectile will pass through ghosts.

BOSS.name: Boss
BOSS.description: This thing is a major boss.

NODMGTHRUST.name: No damage thrust
NODMGTHRUST.description: This thing does not thrust the target when damaging it.

TELESTOMP.name: Teleport stomp
TELESTOMP.description: This thing can stomp another thing when teleporting.

FLOATBOB.name: Float bobbing
FLOATBOB.description: This thing uses float bobbing movement.

IMPACT.name: Activates impact lines
IMPACT.description: This projectile can activate impact (G*) linedefs.

MCROSS.name: Activates monster lines
MCROSS.description: This thing can activate monster cross linedefs.

PCROSS.name: Activates projectile lines
PCROSS.description: This thing can activate projectile cross linedefs.

CANTLEAVEFLOORPIC.name: Cannot leave floor
CANTLEAVEFLOORPIC.description: This thing stays within it's floor type.

NONSHOOTABLE.name: Solid, non-shootable
NONSHOOTABLE.description: This thing is totally non-shootable, but still considered solid.

SEEKERMISSILE.name: Seeker projectile
SEEKERMISSILE.description: This thing is a seeker projectile (for projectile reflection).

HERETICBOUNCE.name: Heretic bounce
HERETICBOUNCE.description: This projectile will only bounce off the floor once and then enter its death state. It does not bounce off walls.

HEXENBOUNCE.name: Hexen bounce
HEXENBOUNCE.description: This projectile bounces off of walls and floors indefinitely.

DOOMBOUNCE.name: Doom bounce
DOOMBOUNCE.description: Like Hexen bouncing, but the bounce turns off if its vertical velocity is too low.

TRANSLATION1.name: Color 1 (grey\red)
TRANSLATION1.description: This thing's green colors will be mapped to grey (or red if the Color 2 flag is also set).

TRANSLATION2.name: Color 2 (brown\red)
TRANSLATION2.description: This thing's green colors will be mapped to brown (or red if the Color 1 flag is also set).

FLOORHUGGER.name: Hugs floor
FLOORHUGGER.description: This projectile stays on the floor.

CEILINGHUGGER.name: Hugs ceiling
CEILINGHUGGER.description: This projectile stays on the ceiling.

NORADIUSDMG.name: Takes no radius damage
NORADIUSDMG.description: This thing does not take radius damage.

ALWAYSPUFF.name: Always puffs
ALWAYSPUFF.description: A puff from this thing always appears, even when it hit nothing.

FULLVOLDEATH.name: Full volume death
FULLVOLDEATH.description: This thing's death sound is played at full volume regardless of distance to the listener.

DONTSPLASH.name: Do not splash
DONTSPLASH.description: This thing does not make splashes.

NOSIGHTCHECK.name: No sight checking
NOSIGHTCHECK.description: This thing goes after the first acceptable target without checking sight.

DONTOVERLAP.name: Does not pass over\under
DONTOVERLAP.description: This thing does not pass over or under other things.

FULLVOLACTIVE.name: Full volume active sound
FULLVOLACTIVE.description: This thing's active sound is played at full volume.

CLERICINVUL.name: Cleric invulnerability
CLERICINVUL.description: This thing is a player who has Hexen's Cleric's invulnerability behavior.

SKYEXPLODE.name: Explodes against sky
SKYEXPLODE.description: This projectile explodes when hitting the sky.

DONTBLAST.name: Cannot be blasted
DONTBLAST.description: This thing cannot be pushed by blasting.

CANBLAST.name: Can be blasted
CANBLAST.description: This thing is not a monster but can be blasted.

NOTARGET.name: Do not target
NOTARGET.description: This thing is not targetted when it hurts something else.

DONTGIB.name: Do not gib
DONTGIB.description: This thing is a corpse that cannot be gibbed.

NOBLOCKMONST.name: Ignore monster blocking
NOBLOCKMONST.description: This thing can cross ML_BLOCKMONSTERS linedefs.

HUNTPLAYERS.name: Hunts players
HUNTPLAYERS.description: When used with TIDtoHate, this thing will hate other players too.

CANBOUNCEWATER.name: Bounces on water
CANBOUNCEWATER.description: This projectile can bounce on water.

NOWALLBOUNCESND.name: No wall bounce sound
NOWALLBOUNCESND.description: This thing does not make a noise when bouncing off a wall.

FOILINVUL.name: Ignore invulnerability
FOILINVUL.description: This thing can hurt things with the INVULNERABLE flag.

NOTELEOTHER.name: Cannot teleport by other
NOTELEOTHER.description: This monster is unaffected by "teleport other artifact".

BLOODLESSIMPACT.name: Leave no blood
BLOODLESSIMPACT.description: This projectile does not leave blood behind.

NOEXPLODEFLOOR.name: No floor explosion
NOEXPLODEFLOOR.description: This projectile disappears at the floor instead of exploding.

PUFFONACTORS.name: Puffs on actors
PUFFONACTORS.description: A puff will appear even when hit by other things.

QUICKTORETALIATE.name: Always switch target
QUICKTORETALIATE.description: This thing will always switch targets when hurt.

NOICEDEATH.name: No ice death
NOICEDEATH.description: This thing never enters an ice death state, not even the generic one.

RANDOMIZE.name: Random initial tic count
RANDOMIZE.description: This projectile has a random initial tic count.

NOSKIN.name: Cannot use skins
NOSKIN.description: This player thing cannot use skins.

FIXMAPTHINGPOS.name: Fix thing position
FIXMAPTHINGPOS.description: Fix this thing's position when spawned as a map thing.

STRIFEDAMAGE.name: Strife projectile damage
STRIFEDAMAGE.description: This Strife projectile only does up to 4x damage, not 8x.

STANDSTILL.name: Stand still unless attacked
STANDSTILL.description: This thing should not chase targets unless attacked.

NOINFIGHTING.name: No infighting
NOINFIGHTING.description: This thing does not switch target when it's hurt.

FULLDROP.name: Is dropped, full ammo
FULLDROP.description: Same as DROPPED flag, but will still give full ammo.

SCREENSEEKER.name: Screen seeker
SCREENSEEKER.description: This thing fails the IsOkayToAttack test if potential target is outside player FOV.

NOTARGETSWITCH.name: Never switch target
NOTARGETSWITCH.description: This thing never switches target until the current one is dead.

BLOODSPLATTER.name: Blood splatter
BLOODSPLATTER.description: This thing produces blood splatter when damaged.

SYNCMOVEMENT.name: Synchronize movement
SYNCMOVEMENT.description: This thing moves idiosynchratically. The server should always send its position.

NOSPEEDCHECK.name: No speed check
NOSPEEDCHECK.description: Don't kill this projectile if it does not move.

CHASEGOAL.name: Chase goal
CHASEGOAL.description: This thing walks to a goal instead of targetting it if a valid goal is set.

VISIBILITYPULSE.name: Visibility pulse
VISIBILITYPULSE.description: This thing has a pulsing effect.
